article_title: Professors: Cruz-Kasich pact sign of desperation
article_text:
Greensburg, IN (47240)

Today

Considerable cloudiness. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 85F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Ken de la Bastide The Herald Bulletin

og.description: ANDERSON -- The decision by Ohio Gov. John Kasich and Texas Sen. Ted Cruz to work together to stop Donald Trump from gaining the Republican Party’s presidential nomination is considered
